MAPPING.DESCRIPTION: This Mapping Loads the data from LAWSON.ITEMSRC to DA.ITEMSRC of TPROD1.
MAPPING.NAME: m_ITEM_SRC

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT DISTINCT ITEMSRC.ITEM, ITEMSRC.LOCATION, ITEMSRC.REPLENISH_PRI, ITEMSRC.VENDOR, ITEMSRC.PURCH_FR_LOC FROM $$SCHEMA.ITEMSRC WHERE ITEMSRC.REPLENISH_PRI > 1 and (LENGTH(TRIM(ITEMSRC.ITEM)) <= 6 OR LENGTH(TRIM(ITEMSRC.ITEM)) BETWEEN 17 and 23)

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: We filter out the records whose length is 17 or 6 and whose reple_pri>0.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: FL_ITEM_AND_REPLE_PRI

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This Store Procedure truncates the target table DA.ITEMSRC of TPROD1
INSTANCE.NAME: SP_TRUNCATE_ITEMSRC

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: We filter out the records whose length is 17 or 6 and whose reple_pri>0.
INSTANCE.NAME: FL_ITEM_AND_REPLE_PRI

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Maximum Memory Allowed For Auto Memory Attributes
Maximum Percentage of Total Memory Allowed For Auto Memory Attributes

Session Log File Max Time Period

SESSION.DESCRIPTION: This session holds the mapping (m_ITEMSRC) which loads the data into itemsrc table of TPROD1.
SESSION.NAME: s_m_ITEMSRC

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Save session log for these runs
Write Backward Compatible Session Log File
Allow Pushdown for User Incompatible Connections

WORKFLOW.DESCRIPTION: This Workflow triggers the session s_m_ITEMSRC which loads the data into DA.ITEMSRC of TPROD1
WORKFLOW.NAME: wf_s_m_ITEMSRC

TASKINSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This session holds the mapping (m_ITEMSRC) which loads the data into itemsrc table of TPROD1.
TASKINSTANCE.NAME: s_m_ITEMSRC

WORKFLOWVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Status of the previous task that is not disabled
WORKFLOWVARIABLE.NAME: $s_m_ITEMSRC.PrevTaskStatus

WORKFLOWVARIABLE.NAME: $s_m_ITEMSRC.ErrorMsg
